Tool Tip: The System assigns this value in sequence as records are created.
Click to upload one or more image files.
Select the Image for the Work of Art record.
Input type: Select single image from uploaded images.

Tool Tip: Descriptive Title in English
Title in language of Repository if Non-English; list vernacular name if Main Title is Formal.
If the precise single date of the Work of Art is known, indicate it here.
If the date is provided in narrative form, i.e. "Circa 1400" or "first third of the fifteenth century," indicate it here
If the Work of Art is dated in a range of dates, insert start date here (adhere to conventions if it is a narrative date like "late fifteenth-century")
If the Work of Art is dated in a range of dates, insert end date here (adhere to conventions if it is a narrative date like "late fifteenth-century")
Select Artist(s) from list. Names are formatted according to an authority list: e.g. VIAF, Getty ULAN.
Details of the Artist as entered in the Configuration table
Select the Repository where the Work of Art is currently located, or its last known location.
Details of the Repository as entered in the Configuration table
Indicate the inventory designation provided by the Repository.
Paste live link, if available, to Repository URL for this specific Artwork.
Indicate the Country, Region, or Specific Place where the item was made.
Details of the Place of Production as entered in the Configuration table
Location of origin of Work of Art
Sample: Basilica of San Domenico, Siena, Italy

Tool Tip: Details of the Origin Location as entered in the Configuration table
Name of associated religious order or context of original commission.
Select the Object Type.

Select the Material(s) used in the Artwork. 
Data entry should conform to principles of Getty CDWA: https://www.getty.edu/research/publications/electronic_publications/cdwa/8materials.html
Sample:
“Stone,
Wood,
Metal,
Glass,
Textile, mixed, etc.

Tool Tip:
Select technique(s) used in the Artwork.
(This value list will be generalized from Getty CDWA.)
Indicate Work of Art Height, if known (in cm).
Indicate Work of Art Width, if known (in cm).
Indicate Work of Art Depth, if known (in cm).
Indicate the total number of documents visible in the Work of Art.
Number of visible documents for which a Document Records havel been created.
Input type: System-Entered, based on number of Document Records created for the Artwork

Tool Tip: Date the record was created, entered by System.
Date the record was modified, entered by System.
ID of User who created entry, entered by System.
ID of User who changed publication status, entered by System.
Whether the Work of Art is published published on the Public Search Interface.
Input type: System-Entered, based on checkbox status in List of Works of Art

Tool Tip: Text field for use entering pertinent information not covered in data fields, searchable in keyword search
Sample: “Figures in background thought to be angels.”

Tool Tip: Add tags according to BASIRA conventions
